universal: put Type Aliases of universalExecutor here,and than it will be added to a Executor named

targeted.tip: targeted executor - sampleTargetedExecutor will be use to deal with key1 and key2 when you use the namedExecutor - sample
targeted.tip2: sample will be automatically ignored bu configuration builder,that means you can not naming an executor with sample

default.tip: defaultConfiguration will be added to all the other namedExecutorConfiguration. Please handle with care
